医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
使用大麻会导致勃起功能障碍吗？研究发现，使用孟德尔随机分析发现大麻使用与勃起功能障碍或性激素水平变化之间没有因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Does-cannabis-use-cause-erectile-dysfunction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Does-cannabis-use-cause-erectile-dysfunction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab8ee2cf-3c82-4d6a-acf7-c26e8c782336 Fri, 07 Jun 2024 01:12:00 -0400 Does cannabis use cause erectile dysfunction?
研究表明，气候变化政策忽视了儿童的心理健康和特殊需求最近的一项研究强调了气候变化政策中针对儿童的适应措施的迫切需要，揭示了在解决儿童健康和心理健康方面的巨大差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Climate-change-policies-neglect-childrens-mental-health-and-specific-needs-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Climate-change-policies-neglect-childrens-mental-health-and-specific-needs-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=022eecaf-ed23-43ea-a9df-486a3528e8d6 Fri, 07 Jun 2024 00:57:00 -0400 Climate change policies neglect children's mental health and specific needs, study reveals
InDevR 和义翘神州联手为 mRNA 疫苗以及细胞和基因治疗提供多重分析解决方案InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR，InDevR的公司的领导者，疫苗过程和质量控制测试分析解决方案的领导者，以及Sino Biological，Inc.，一家在深圳证券交易所子公司创业板上市的生物技术公司，专门从事生物研究试剂和相关技术合同研究服务，今天宣布建立新的合作伙伴关系，以加快多种疫苗、mRNA 疗法以及细胞和基因疗法应用的多重检测的开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/InDevR-and-Sino-Biological-team-up-to-deliver- Multiplexed-analytical-solutions-for-mRNA-vaccine-and-cell-gene-治疗.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/InDevR-and-Sino-Biological-team-up-to-deliver- Multiplexed-analytical-solutions-for-mRNA-vaccine-and-cell-gene- therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7aa9916e-62ba-4a7b-9ad5-6c3b86cd4a5b Fri, 07 Jun 2024 00:57:00 -0400 InDevR and Sino Biological team up to deliver multiplexed analytical solutions for mRNA vaccine and cell & gene therapy
研究发现，父亲在受孕前的饮食会影响孩子的代谢健康研究表明，父亲的高脂肪饮食可以通过精子线粒体 RNA 的变化影响后代的代谢健康，可能导致葡萄糖不耐受。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Fathers-diet-before-conception-can-impact-childrens-metabolic-health-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Fathers-diet-before-conception-can-impact-childrens-metabolic-health-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca0dba9f-c3f4-4fa2-80d9-bc080fc7fffc Fri, 07 Jun 2024 00:33:00 -0400 Father's diet before conception can impact children's metabolic health, study finds
基因发现揭示了炎症性疾病的关键研究人员发现 21 号染色体上的特定单倍型与五种炎症性疾病有关，为潜在的新疗法提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Genetic-discovery-reveals-key-to-炎症-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Genetic-discovery-reveals-key-to-炎症-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17bd295b-b29f-462b-8b80-e0707b123057 Fri, 07 Jun 2024 00:15:00 -0400 Genetic discovery reveals key to inflammatory diseases
姜黄素纳米颗粒在治疗神经退行性疾病方面显示出前景综述证明了姜黄素在神经退行性疾病中的神经保护作用，通过创新的纳米颗粒配方增强了其潜力。这一进步可以显着改善帕金森氏症、阿尔茨海默氏症和多发性硬化症等疾病的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Curcumin-nanoarticles-show-promise-in-treating-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Curcumin-nanoarticles-show-promise-in-treating-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4e354bd-4b74-4e21-b527-e328393d82e2 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 23:18:00 -0400 Curcumin nanoparticles show promise in treating neurodegenerative diseases
新的大脑扫描工具揭示了儿童大脑发育的关键见解研究表明，OPM-MEG 工具可以有效跟踪 2 至 34 岁个体的大脑发育和神经振荡，为神经健康和发育提供新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/New-brain-scan-tool-reveals-key-insights-into-childhood-brain-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/New-brain-scan-tool-reveals-key-insights-into-childhood-brain-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0b48eb1-5623-42e6-abfe-8a22e0c04385 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 22:55:00 -0400 New brain scan tool reveals key insights into childhood brain development
新的 5 分钟认知测试可促进不同老年人群的痴呆症护理5-Cog 工具具有文化敏感性且易于管理，显着增强了初级保健中老年人的痴呆症诊断和护理，尤其是黑人和西班牙裔社区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/New-5-minute-cognitive-test-boosts-dementia-care-in-diverse-elderly-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/New-5-minute-cognitive-test-boosts-dementia-care-in-diverse-elderly-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae764ce8-96b5-4cbf-930e-b43c78f9cf31 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 22:39:00 -0400 New 5-minute cognitive test boosts dementia care in diverse elderly populations
研究显示孤独会缩短老年人的健康寿命研究表明，孤独感会显着降低老年人（尤其是女性）的健康预期寿命，这凸显了采取有针对性的健康干预措施以改善福祉和健康的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Loneiness-slashes-healthy-years-in-older-adults-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Loneiness-slashes-healthy-years-in-older-adults-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6820e4e-e563-4c3d-ba2d-f4865ad64d6d Thu, 06 Jun 2024 22:25:00 -0400 Loneliness slashes healthy years in older adults, study reveals
肠道微生物群失衡与女性尿路感染风险较高有关研究表明，肠道微生物失调和频繁使用抗生素是女性复发性尿路感染 (UTI) 的关键危险因素，强调了健康的生活方式和膳食补充剂对预防尿路感染的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Gut-microbiota-imbalance-linked-to-higher-UTI-risks-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Gut-microbiota-imbalance-linked-to-higher-UTI-risks-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfcadcff-34d0-482b-9ffb-f9e66b0ca9be Thu, 06 Jun 2024 22:14:00 -0400 Gut microbiota imbalance linked to higher UTI risks in women
